short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right-click any text to search Amazon.com ... and save money.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Select any text then press the right-click mouse button. Select "Search Amazon.com for ..." then choose any option.

That's it!

Disclaimer: Amazonica was created by an independent affiliate of Amazon.com. If you make a purchase after searching with Amazonica, the creator of this extension may get a commission.
